chatGptDialog.areYouSureYouWantToAskChat:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the ChatGPT confirmation dialog.
**UI Location**: ChatGPT Feedback Dialog (modal header).
**When Users See This**: When a user attempts to ask ChatGPT for assistance.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Are you sure you want to ask ChatGPT?"
chatGptDialog.chatGptIsAPowerfulTool:
**Functional Purpose**: Explains the implications of using ChatGPT.
**UI Location**: ChatGPT Feedback Dialog (modal body).
**When Users See This**: When a user attempts to ask ChatGPT for assistance.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "ChatGPT is a powerful tool, but it can also make it too easy to get unstuck and remove a lot of the learning opportunity that comes from wrestling with a problem. We recommend only using it when you're too stuck to continue without help."
chatGptDialog.selectAModel:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the model selection dropdown.
**UI Location**: ChatGPT Feedback Dialog (above model selection).
**When Users See This**: When selecting a ChatGPT model.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Select a model:"
chatGptDialog.youHaveExceededTheLimit:
**Functional Purpose**: Error message when a user has exceeded their ChatGPT usage limit.
**UI Location**: ChatGPT Feedback Dialog (alert message).
**When Users See This**: When a user attempts to ask ChatGPT but has no remaining requests for their selected model.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "You have exceeded the limit"
chatGptDialog.go:
**Functional Purpose**: Action button to proceed with asking ChatGPT.
**UI Location**: ChatGPT Feedback Dialog (bottom right button).
**When Users See This**: When confirming the use of ChatGPT.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Go"
chatGptDialog.cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Action button to close the dialog and cancel the ChatGPT request.
**UI Location**: ChatGPT Feedback Dialog (bottom left button).
**When Users See This**: When deciding not to proceed with asking ChatGPT.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Cancel"
